attributes.action: Release the complete and unedited Brexit assessment papers for everyone to read
attributes.additional_details: This is so that the British people can read the documents themselves and determine (with their own minds) whether Britain leaving the European Union is a good thing, a bad thing or of no consequence whatsoever.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, call on the Secretary of State for exiting the European Union (David Davis MP) and the department of which he is the head of, to release, on passing of a vote in Westminster Hall as a result of this petition, the complete, unedited assessment papers on the effects of Brexit
